title: How does Hermeticism relate to discernment, transparency, and human enlightenment?
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens, the text delves into the concept of breaking out of one's shell to release the true self. Carlos Castaneda's book is referenced where Don Juan explains that breaking the shell and losing the soul is the only way to release the luminous core. The text further emphasizes the importance of discernment, cultivating real values, and neutrality to achieve transparency. The goal of alchemy is also mentioned, where working on every aspect of oneself is crucial to attaining consciousness. The text concludes with the importance of being serene and detached in pursuing freedom.

Inutile intraprenderla se non domina tutti s altre preoccupazioni. Per l'ermetismo, tutto ciò che è essenzialmente il corpo, come pure umano, l'albero, i sentimenti, le idee e anche "Dio". Og, la necessità di lavorare su queste sostanze per ottenere coscienza e, come è l'obiettivo ammirevole di Alchimia, obiettivo troppo spesso frainteso.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the path to achieving superhuman realization is complicated and requires the mastery of the essential elements of humanity and nature. The true alchemy is not just the transmutation of matter but also the reconstruction of the fallen human from their lost state. Therefore, we must remember that everything in this universe is material in some way, including the Absolute, meaning that our goal of achieving the phoenix's work is not impossible.
